ActJudges Act
SubjectDoris Callaghan ** ANNUITY ** The Hon. Howard A. Callaghan **
PrecisGranting of an ANNUITY to DORIS CALLAGHAN, survivor of the Hon. Howard A. Callaghan, a Judge of the Supreme Court of British Columbia, effective February 16, 2016.
AttachmentsAttachment
